body_html: Thanks @agniszczotka -- that is an interesting area of research. While we don't currently have resources to devote to a pre-baked solution here, we are happy to consider contributions that enable population based training for Estimators-- let us know if you are interested.

body: Thanks @agniszczotka -- that is an interesting area of research. While we don't currently have resources to devote to a pre-baked solution here, we are happy to consider contributions that enable population based training for Estimators-- let us know if you are interested.
